casebody.data:
JOHN DENICOLA, JR. v. STOP AND SHOP COMPANIES, INC. (14017)

Dupont, C. X, and Lavery and Herman, Js.

Argued December 14, 1995 decision released January 30, 1996 Robert S. Bystrowski, with whom, on the brief, was Andrew H. Sharp, for the appellant (defendant). Richard Jacobs, with whom, on the brief, was Steven D. Jacobs, for the appellee (plaintiff). PER CURIAM.

The decision of the workers’ compensation review board is affirmed.
